document.full_text: a fire that broke out at japan's crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear plant has been put out, operator tokyo electric power co (tepco) said on tuesday.
document.title: fire at japan's fukushima nuclear plant put out
lines_and_colors: a fire that broke out at japan's crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear plant has been put out, operator tokyo electric power co (tepco) said on tuesday.
